nodes.text: Titan Magazines, also known as Titan Comics, is the world's leading publisher of officially licensed film and television magazines. The company has published Star Wars Comic UK, Star Wars: The Clone Wars Magazine (both edited by Jon Chapple), Star Wars Magazine, and Star Wars Rebels Magazine. It also published Star Wars: The Official Magazine until it began publishing Star Wars Insider (edited by Jonathan Wilkins through issue 174) during Celebration IV in May 2007.
